TopicTitle: Mouse and Keyboard Accesibility for KSP on Xbox

Articles.Content: Theres a new feature you can use on xbox involving mouses and keyboards by signing up to xbox insiders. I'd love it if the KSP devs could make KSP Enhanced edition compatible with it.
The keyboard hotkeys are working on my chatpad and I'm not signed up for the insider program. Give it a try. It's awesome!
